title: Eureka Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Vacuum Cleaner for Home Rechargeable, Lightweight Stick Vacuum for Hardwood and Pet Hair, Blue w/Clean Station, NEC490BL
description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier.
Eureka Stylus Elite equipped with 350W BLDC motor provides great suction power for superior cordless cleaning on all floors, while still being lightweight for max maneuverability

Anti-Tangle brushroll delivers powerful hair pickup, effective reduces hair tangling, which is suitable for all kinds of floors, including hard floor, carpet and maple. Ideal for pet family, prevent hair and debris entanglement.
Just place the handstick on top of the dust bin station and it'll automatically empty. Offer a convenient and efficient cleaning experience, saving you time and effort.
Eureka Stylus Elite cordless vacuum offers 15/40/60min 3 cleaning time in different modes which can satisfy your needs. Flexible charging ensures uninterrupted cleaning.
Elite self-empying vacuum includes multi-stage filtration that separates and filters up to 99.9%** of microdust particles to ensure cleaner air and a healthier environment
Enhance your cleaning experience with our wide range of additional accessories (crevice tool, 2-in-1 dusting brush) designed to tackle every nook and cranny of your home.
If you have any questions,contact our customer service team at 1-800-282-2886
